title: What is HTML?
description: Learn the basics of HTML, the language that structures web content.
content:
HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages. HTML describes the structure of a Web page semantically and originally included cues for the appearance of the document. ### Basic Document Structure: Every HTML document should have a basic structure: * ``: The document type declaration. * ``: The root element. * ``: Contains meta-information about the HTML document. * ``: Contains the visible page content. ```html My Web Page
